name: Korean BBQ Chicken

ingredients.name: Korean BBQ Chicken & Ribs Sauce Mix
ketchup, rice vinegar, and soy sauce

preparation: In a bowl, whisk seasoning with soy sauce, rice vinegar and ketchup.
Liberally brush over grilled meat towards end of cooking.
In a bowl, whisk seasoning with soy sauce, rice vinegar and ketchup.

Coat chicken with sauce and place on sheet pan. Roast in preheated 350° F. oven until cooked through and has reached a safe internal temperature of 165° F. when an instant read thermometer is inserted into thickest part, about 20-30 min. Time will vary depending on cuts used.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 corn cob and 1 1⁄2 cups mixed greens with 2 tbsp Epicure salad dressing, your choice.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
